oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Panel discussion - Remembering Ray Charles
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Former band members and associates of Ray Charles discuss his career and relationship with country music. Moderated by Michael Gray. Companion to the Ray Charles exhibit at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: David "Fathead' Newman; David Ritz; Jim Williamson; Michael Gray
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Newman, David, 1933-2009; Ritz, David; Williamson, Jim (Musician); Gray, Michael; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
